description.value:
At 8th level, as a standard action, you can ask one question of a dead creature as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{Speak with Dead}. The dead creature you are questioning does not gain a Will saving throw if your alignments are different. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your cleric level.

This power replaces the Ward Against Death power of the Repose Domain.
